languages.text: "Мы столько раз слышали, как ксеносы называют нас низшими, примитивными созданиями. Но сами они ведут себя подобно мелкой знати с захудалой планеты — заискивают перед сильными, унижают слабых, избавляются от конкурентов грязными методами".

"We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."
languages.original_text: "Мы столько раз слышали, как ксеносы называют нас низшими, примитивными созданиями. Но сами они ведут себя подобно мелкой знати с захудалой планеты — заискивают перед сильными, унижают слабых, избавляются от конкурентов грязными методами".

traits.locale_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族が私たちのことを劣った原始的な生き物と呼ぶのを何度も耳にしたわ。それなのに、彼らはまるで僻地の惑星の小貴族のように振る舞い、権力者に取り入り、弱者を辱め、汚い手段でライバルを処分している」
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族が私たちのことを劣った原始的な生き物と呼ぶのを何度も耳にしたわ。それなのに、彼らはまるで僻地の惑星の小貴族のように振る舞い、権力者に取り入り、弱者を辱め、汚い手段でライバルを処分している」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那些异形总说我们是低等的原始生物，可他们的行为就像一群没见过世面的乡巴佬贵族一样：讨好强者，羞辱弱者，用卑鄙的手段铲除对手。”
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: “那些异形总说我们是低等的原始生物，可他们的行为就像一群没见过世面的乡巴佬贵族一样：讨好强者，羞辱弱者，用卑鄙的手段铲除对手。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Hemos oído tantas veces a los xenos llamarnos criaturas inferiores primitivas, pero son ellos los que se comportan como nobles en un planeta atrasado, haciéndole la pelota a los poderosos, humillando a los débiles y deshaciéndose de sus rivales suciamente».
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos oído tantas veces a los xenos llamarnos criaturas inferiores primitivas, pero son ellos los que se comportan como nobles en un planeta atrasado, haciéndole la pelota a los poderosos, humillando a los débiles y deshaciéndose de sus rivales suciamente».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben so oft gehört, wie die Xenos uns minderwertige, primitive Kreaturen nennen. Doch sie verhalten sich wie erbärmliche Adlige von einem unbedeutenden Planeten irgendwo im Nirgendwo, schleimen sich bei den Mächtigen ein, demütigen die Schwachen, beseitigen mit schmutzigen Mitteln Rivalen."
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben so oft gehört, wie die Xenos und minderwertige, primitive Kreaturen nennen. Doch sie behalten sich wie erbärmliche Adlige von einem unbedeutenden Planeten irgendwo im Nirgendwo, schleimen sich bei den Mächtigen ein, demütigen die Schwachen, beseitigen mit schmutzigen Mitteln Rivalen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les xénos n'ont de cesse de nous considérer comme des créatures inférieures et primitives, alors qu'eux-mêmes se comportent comme des noblaillons mesquins d'une planète reculée, à lécher les bottes des puissants, à humilier les faibles et à essayer de se débarrasser de leurs rivaux par tous les moyens possibles, aussi vils soient-ils. »
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: « Les xénos n'ont de cesse de nous considérer comme des créatures inférieures et primitives, alors qu'eux-mêmes se comportent comme des noblaillons mesquins d'une planète reculée, à lécher les bottes des puissants, à humilier les faibles et à essayer de se débarrasser de leurs rivaux par tous les moyens possibles, aussi vils soient-ils. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Zenoların bize aşağılık, ilkel yaratıklar dediklerini çok duyduk ama kendileri ücra bir gezegendeki ezik soylular gibi davranıyor. Güçlü olanlara yalakalık yapıp zayıf olanları küçümsüyor, kirli oyunlarla rakiplerini saf dışı bırakıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "We have heard the xenos call us inferior, primitive creatures so many times. But they behave like petty nobles from a backwater planet, ingratiating themselves with the powerful, humiliating the weak, disposing of rivals through dirty means."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların bize aşağılık, ilkel yaratıklar dediklerini çok duyduk ama kendileri ücra bir gezegendeki ezik soylular gibi davranıyor. Güçlü olanlara yalakalık yapıp, zayıf olanları küçümseyip, kirli oyunlarla rakiplerini saf dışı bırakıyorlar."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
